original_text:
Water shall flow from his buckets,
    and his seed shall be in many waters;
his king shall be higher than Agag,
    and his kingdom shall be exalted.
korean_text: 그 물통에서는 물이 넘치겠고 그 씨는 많은 물 가에 있으리로다 그의 왕이 아각보다 높으니 그의 나라가 흥왕하리로다

sentences.original_text: Water shall flow from his buckets
and his seed shall be in many waters
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 씨가 많은 물 속에 있을 것이며

sentences.original_text: his king shall be higher than Agag
and his kingdom shall be exalted
